history.proof: intros n st src t v. unfold handleRequestVoteReply. destruct (currentTerm st <? t) eqn:E1. - simpl. srun best use: advanceCurrentTerm_clientCache. - destruct (t <? currentTerm st) eqn:E2. + reflexivity. + unfold wonElection. simpl. hauto q: on depth: 3use: handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params n : name st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output src : name t : nat v : bool E1 : (currentTerm st <? t) = true Unable to unify "clientCache st" with "clientCache (advanceCurrentTerm st t)".

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (voteGranted && bool_recognize (dedup name_eq_dec (src :: votesReceived st))) eqn:E3.
exceptions.exn: The reference voteGranted was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "log (handleRequestVoteReply ?M1645 ?M1646 ?M1647 ?M1648 ?M1649)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params n : name st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output src : name t : nat v : bool E1 : (currentTerm st <? t) = false E2 : (t <? currentTerm st) = false Unable to unify "clientCache st" with "clientCache match type st with | Candidate => mkRaft_data (currentTerm st) (votedFor st) (leaderId st) (log st) (commitIndex st) (lastApplied st) (stateMachine st) [] [(n, maxIndex (log st))] (shouldSend st) ((if v then [src] else []) ++ votesReceived st) (if v && match length (if in_dec name_eq_dec src (votesReceived st) then dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st) else src :: dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st)) with | 0 => false | S m' => div2 (length nodes) <=? m' end then Leader else type st) (clientCache st) ((if v && match length (if in_dec name_eq_dec src (votesReceived st) then dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st) else src :: dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st)) with | 0 => false | S m' => div2 (length nodes) <=? m' end then [(currentTerm st, src :: votesReceived st, log st)] else []) ++ electoralVictories st) | _ => st end".

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "log (handleRequestVoteReply ?M1645 ?M1646 ?M1647 ?M1648 ?M1649)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params n : name st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output src : name t : nat v : bool E1 : (currentTerm st <? t) = false E2 : (t <? currentTerm st) = false Unable to unify "clientCache st" with "clientCache match type st with | Candidate => mkRaft_data (currentTerm st) (votedFor st) (leaderId st) (log st) (commitIndex st) (lastApplied st) (stateMachine st) [] [(n, maxIndex (log st))] (shouldSend st) ((if v then [src] else []) ++ votesReceived st) (if v && match length (if in_dec name_eq_dec src (votesReceived st) then dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st) else src :: dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st)) with | 0 => false | S m' => div2 (length nodes) <=? m' end then Leader else type st) (clientCache st) ((if v && match length (if in_dec name_eq_dec src (votesReceived st) then dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st) else src :: dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st)) with | 0 => false | S m' => div2 (length nodes) <=? m' end then [(currentTerm st, src :: votesReceived st, log st)] else []) ++ electoralVictories st) | _ => st end".

original: intros n st src t v. simpl. unfold handleRequestVoteReply. destruct (currentTerm st <? t) eqn:E1. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct (t <? currentTerm st) eqn:E2. + simpl. reflexivity. + unfold wonElection. destruct (voteGranted && bool_recognize (dedup name_eq_dec (src :: votesReceived st))) eqn:E3. * simpl. rewrite handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite. reflexivity. * simpl. rewrite handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite. reflexivity.
